name: Men on the Edge
description: Brutal challenges with strength, striptease, and adrenaline. The best mode for an all-guys crew!

dares.title: Speed Push-Ups
dares.action: ${c_player}, do 15 push-ups as fast as you can.

dares.title: Handstand Hold
dares.action: ${c_player}, hold a handstand for at least 10 seconds.

dares.title: One-Hand Shirt Off
dares.action: ${c_player}, dramatically take off your shirt using one hand.

dares.title: Abs Dance
dares.action: ${c_player}, perform a belly dance.

dares.title: Arm Wrestling
dares.action: ${c_player} and ${r_player}, do a mini arm-wrestling match.

dares.title: Plank Challenge
dares.action: ${c_player}, hold a plank for 30 seconds.

dares.title: Muscle Show
dares.action: ${c_player}, show your top three bodybuilder poses.

dares.title: Boxing Minute
dares.action: ${c_player}, throw punches in the air for 20 seconds.

dares.title: Burpee Challenge
dares.action: ${c_player}, do 10 burpees in 30 seconds.

dares.title: Magic Mike Move
dares.action: ${c_player}, mimic a dance move from Magic Mike.

dares.title: Clap Push-Ups
dares.action: ${c_player}, do 15 clap push-ups.

dares.title: Bridge Pose
dares.action: ${c_player}, do a bridge and hold for 10 seconds.

dares.title: One-Leg Hops
dares.action: ${c_player}, hop on one leg for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Strip of Silence
dares.action: ${c_player}, take off one clothing item and stay serious for 30 seconds.

dares.title: Victory Lap
dares.action: ${c_player}, run a lap around the table or room.

dares.title: Beach Body Flex
dares.action: ${c_player}, act like a bodybuilder on the beach for 20 seconds.

dares.title: Shadow Boxing
dares.action: ${c_player}, shadow box for one round.

dares.title: Balance Test
dares.action: ${c_player}, stand on one leg with eyes closed for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Powerlifter Minute
dares.action: ${c_player}, pretend to lift an invisible heavy barbell.

dares.title: Lift a Friend
dares.action: ${c_player}, lift ${r_player} and do 3 squats.

dares.title: Ninja Jump
dares.action: ${c_player}, jump as high as you can.

dares.title: Superman Slide
dares.action: ${c_player}, act like Superman flying across the floor.

dares.title: Flying Kick
dares.action: ${c_player}, do a jumping kick.

dares.title: Mini Strip
dares.action: ${c_player}, perform a short striptease for 20 seconds.

dares.title: Push-Up with Weight
dares.action: ${c_player}, do push-ups while ${r_player} sits on your back.

dares.title: High Kick
dares.action: ${c_player}, kick as high as your head.

dares.title: Leg Press
dares.action: ${c_player}, squat while holding ${r_player} on your back.

dares.title: Loud Challenge
dares.action: ${c_player}, loudly and boldly challenge ${r_player} to a duel.

dares.title: Fast Strip
dares.action: ${c_player}, take off any two items of clothing in 15 seconds.

dares.title: Victory Pose
dares.action: ${c_player}, strike a victory pose and hold it for 20 seconds.

dares.title: Table Pull-Ups
dares.action: ${c_player}, do 10 pull-ups using a table or other surface.

dares.title: Push-Ups with a Smile
dares.action: ${c_player}, do 10 push-ups while smiling wide.

dares.title: Football Freestyle
dares.action: ${c_player}, show a series of football tricks.

dares.title: Chair Jump
dares.action: ${c_player}, carefully jump over a chair.

dares.title: Flexibility Duel
dares.action: ${c_player}, show your maximum stretch.

dares.title: Camera Flex
dares.action: ${c_player}, flex your muscles dramatically for the group.

dares.title: Team Squats
dares.action: All players do 10 squats at the same time.

dares.title: Show of Strength
dares.action: ${c_player}, lift and hold a chair for 10 seconds.

dares.title: Frog Jump
dares.action: ${c_player}, jump over ${r_player} like a frog.

dares.title: Lightning Strikes
dares.action: ${c_player}, show the fastest punches you can.

dares.title: Live Kettlebell
dares.action: ${c_player}, lift ${r_player} like a kettlebell.

dares.title: Squat Ladder
dares.action: ${c_player}, do squats one by one with each player.

dares.title: Pull-Up King
dares.action: ${c_player}, do 10 pull-ups on an imaginary bar.

dares.title: Extreme Jumps
dares.action: ${c_player}, do a set of high jumps.

dares.title: Bodybuilder Minute
dares.action: ${c_player}, flex for each player one by one.

dares.title: Group Push-Ups
dares.action: All players do 10 push-ups at once. Last to finish drinks.

dares.title: Menâ€™s Strip Show
dares.action: Each player removes one item of clothing. Anyone who refuses drinks.

dares.title: Plank Battle
dares.action: Everyone holds a plank for 30 seconds. First to fall loses and drinks.

dares.title: Arm Wrestling Ring
dares.action: Do an arm wrestling tournament. The winner picks someone to drink.

dares.title: Jump Relay
dares.action: Players take turns doing 5 high jumps. Lowest number drinks.

dares.title: Sparta Challenge
dares.action: All yell 'This is Sparta!' and strike fighting poses. Quietest drinks.

dares.title: Push-Up Ring
dares.action: Everyone does push-ups. First to stop drinks.

dares.title: Battle Cry
dares.action: Each player gives their loudest battle cry. Weakest one drinks.

dares.title: Brotherhood Strength
dares.action: Players link arms and do 10 squats in sync. Anyone off-beat drinks.

dares.title: Warrior Dance
dares.action: All perform a battle dance for 15 seconds. Anyone who refuses drinks.
